KonnichiWa and Happy New Year Hazu-- We were quite surprised 
yesterday to see that several of the groups in the parade in Philly 
had Samurais as a theme. And in Times Square on NY Eve the 
predominant sign was Tom Cruise in The Last Samurai. Just thought 
you'd like to know that Samurais are popular today.-Keiman and Kei.
